title: GOP criticism escalates after latest Minneapolis shooting
shortDescription: A growing number of Republican lawmakers are breaking ranks and expressing criticism, and anger, over the killing of Alex Pretti by federal agents.

title: 'Your eyes don't lie.' Trump, ICE, a death and a turning point
shortDescription: In an era of smartphones, Americans don't have to believe federal officials or journalists. They can watch what happened for themselves.

title: Trump says 'Top Secret fact' was 'exposed' due to ballroom lawsuit
shortDescription: The East Wing, beneath which an underground bomb shelter has been located since the 1940s, was demolished in October.

title: Is Republicans' Greenland headache finally ending?
shortDescription: Trump's posture toward Greenland has caused weeks of headaches for GOP lawmakers. They're happy he struck a NATO deal, but the details remain unclear.

title: Walz blasts ICE, Trump after fatal shooting
shortDescription: Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz slams President Trump and ICE over another fatal shooting by federal agents in Minneapolis.

title: Twice in three hours, Trump warns Canada on China deal: '100% Tariffs'
shortDescription: Trump has been incensed with Carney ever since his attention-grabbing speech at Davos describing a 'rupture' in the world order.

title: Trump to skip Super Bowl, bashes Bad Bunny and Green Day
shortDescription: The president told the New York Post the big game is "just too far away" to attend.

title: Trump says Venezuelan oil is already coming into US refineries
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said in an interview with the New York Post that Venezuelan oil is being processed in American refineries.

title: 'Some controversial people.' See who's on Trump's new Board of Peace
shortDescription: Trump's board includes people charged with war crimes and unelected rulers accused of widespread human rights violations.

title: Trump administration prepares for monster winter storm
shortDescription: President Trump, who plans to remain in Washington over the weekend, is being briefed regularly about the storm, the White House said.

title: Does new ICE policy violate the Fourth Amendment? What to know.
shortDescription: A constitutional law expert called the new ICE policy authorizing agents to enter homes without a judge's warrant a "violation of fundamental rights.‚Äù

title: Did the White House alter a photo of a Minnesota protester?
shortDescription: A post from the White House X account showed what appeared to be a manipulated image of a woman arrested over a protest at a Minnesota church.

title: Jack Smith tells Congress Trump 'engaged in criminal activity'
shortDescription: Former U.S. Special Counsel Jack Smith told a House panel that Trump was "looking for ways to stay in power" following his defeat in the 2020 election
